column4: i have an hp pavilion dv6000 laptop next to caps lock on the laptop is a blue light that turns one when caps is on  but when i plug in the usb keyboard i can type but when i press caps the light does not go i tried in windows and it worked but not in ubuntu

(root) has global permissions and it's VERY easy to screw somehting up. sudo (as root) only allows that one change to be made as a root user
